SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.ui

Class UI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.ui.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gui, Tui
public abstract class UI extends Object
Abstract class for defining the user interface (GUI or TUI). This class contains abstract methods to be implemented by concrete subclasses to handle various UI actions and displays.
